name: Deep space (itch) (Ceelmah)
description:
Meet Sepawaste, our talented and hard-working (wink wink) team behind Deep Space: Beyond:

PROGRAMMING @mordechai and @ozzzim

GRAPHIC DESIGN @olivv-g (check out her other works on Instagram) with additional help from @iasha

MUSIC @cygi (be sure to check out his fantastic Soundcloud!)

STORY AND BUG TESTING @thomasward

SPECIAL THANKS TO supertrain, for proofreading and making sure that every bit of wording is free from mistakes, as well as to dryciak, for doing creepy and disturbing Sepawaste intro.
